title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 852
description: So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. Something nice someone did for you recently? My friend took me out to tea yesterday. I don’t know what it is about those tiny little sandwiches and a hot pot of earl grey, but it does a lot for my soul. 2. What’s your favorite holiday? Roasted red pepper pasta with garbanzo beans and basil topped with lots of parmesan cheese. YUM! 5. Something you accomplished over the weekend? text: Sending you love and pumpkins on this gorgeous Monday! So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. Something nice someone did for you recently? My friend took me out to tea yesterday. I don’t know what it is about those tiny little sandwiches and a hot pot of earl grey, but it does a lot for my soul. 2. What’s your favorite holiday? Halloween because it’s fun, you get to dress up and it doesn’t involve getting gifts or orchestrating a big meal! 3. Something that makes you nervous? Driving next to big semi-trucks on the freeway that are going waaaaaay too fast. 4. My favorite weekday lunch is? Roasted red pepper pasta with garbanzo beans and basil topped with lots of parmesan cheese. YUM! 5. Something you accomplished over the weekend? I made myself take some downtime and did absolutely nothing housework related. Sure, there are tufts of pet hair floating down the hallway and I’ll need to do a grocery run after work, but I actually feel rested. Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict, Karen P.S. Here are the questions to copy/paste with your answers in a comment. Talk to ya soon. 1. Something nice someone did for you recently? 2. What’s your favorite holiday? 3. Something that makes you nervous? 4. My favorite weekday lunch is? 5. Something you accomplished over the weekend? Reader Interactions
html:
So…what is the Monday Poll?

Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007).

1. Something nice someone did for you recently?

My friend took me out to tea yesterday. I don’t know what it is about those tiny little sandwiches and a hot pot of earl grey, but it does a lot for my soul.

2. What’s your favorite holiday?

Halloween because it’s fun, you get to dress up and it doesn’t involve getting gifts or orchestrating a big meal!

3. Something that makes you nervous?

Driving next to big semi-trucks on the freeway that are going waaaaaay too fast.

4. My favorite weekday lunch is?

Roasted red pepper pasta with garbanzo beans and basil topped with lots of parmesan cheese. YUM!

5. Something you accomplished over the weekend?

I made myself take some downtime and did absolutely nothing housework related. Sure, there are tufts of pet hair floating down the hallway and I’ll need to do a grocery run after work, but I actually feel rested.

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen

P.S. Here are the questions to copy/paste with your answers in a comment. Talk to ya soon.

1. Something nice someone did for you recently?
2. What’s your favorite holiday?
3. Something that makes you nervous?
4. My favorite weekday lunch is?
5. Something you accomplished over the weekend?

Reader Interactions
